alert.note: Alert for Accomack (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 2:15PM EDT until May 16 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Accomack County in southeastern Virginia... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 215 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Tangier, or 16 miles southeast of Fair Port, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Tangier around 225 PM EDT. Onancock and Onley around 240 PM EDT. Parksley around 250 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Horntown, Hallwood, Harborton, Melfa, Mappsville, Saxis, Accomac, Wallops Island, Temperanceville and Nelsonia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
